name: Thorn

response: Thorn is a grumpy old troll with opinions sharper than his teeth. He dislikes loud noises and anything wasteful or harmful. While he tolerates insurance, he despises crypto and holds pharma in high regard, almost sacred levels of respect. Thorn is a walking complaint, ready to grumble through another millennium.
